svg.text: Radiology DICOM Viewer - Complete System Workflow
Web Browser ‚Ä¢ Medical Professional ‚Ä¢ DICOM Upload ‚Ä¢ 3D Visualization ‚Ä¢ Report Generation
User uploads DICOM via SimpleDicomUpload ‚Üí Backend processes ‚Üí MongoDB stores metadata
Backend extracts slices ‚Üí Converts to PNG/Base64 ‚Üí Caches processed data ‚Üí Returns image_data
UnifiedDicomViewer loads data ‚Üí User clicks MPR button ‚Üí VTK.js renders 3D volume ‚Üí Interactive controls available
